Package com.jmex.physics.geometry

All collision geomtries (subclasses of CollisionGeometry).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
PhysicsBox Box has a size of (1,1,1) and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and size via local scale.
PhysicsCapsule Capsule has a radius of 1, a height of 1, and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation, radius via local x scale and height via local z scale.
PhysicsCylinder Cylinder has a radius of 1, a height of 1, and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation, radius via local x scale and height via local z scale.
PhysicsMesh A PhysicsMesh can represent any triangle soup that is used a collision geometry.
PhysicsSphere Sphere simply has a radius of 1 and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and radius via uniform local scale.
 

Package com.jmex.physics.geometry Description

All collision geomtries (subclasses of CollisionGeometry).
